item.description:
Aimee and Denny Perrin of Aimee's Livin' Magic will be guest speakers at the March potluck. Aimee is a raw chef and owner of Aimee's Livin' Magic and Denny is general manager. For more information, check out their website at http://www.aimeeslivi.... They are also co-authors of their new book, "Live In Magic." They will be speaking about their 30+ years following a quest for health, healing, and longevity. There will be Aimee's Livin' Magic snacks, treats, and chocolates for sale. You can also pick up a copy of their book at this event!

Please bring a raw vegan dish to share and come in comfy clothes. Additional guests are welcome! Fresh local spring water, iced and hot herbal tea, dishes, cutlery, etc. will be provided. If you need directions, call or email me.

Looking forward to seeing you there! xoxo

group.name: Raw Maine: The Way Food Should Be!

item.name: Raw Maine March Potluck: Livin' Magickally with Aimee and Denny
